content.html: I am so incredibly happy to share that @lizthegrey is now our Field CTO. We try to handle promotions as confirmation of a job already being well done, and that is definitely the case here. Liz is an excellent developer advocate, but never "just" that. honeycomb.io/blog/honeycomb…
content.value:
I am so incredibly happy to share that @lizthegrey is now our Field CTO.

We try to handle promotions as confirmation of a job already being well done, and that is definitely the case here. Liz is an excellent developer advocate, but never "just" that.

honeycomb.io/blog/honeycomb…
